content.description: Climb the slabby fistcrack in the dihedral 40 feet to where it turns vertical.  Continue in the dihedral another 15 feet to a small roof for the topout.  Great rock.
content.protection: Gear to 3.5", maybe 4".  May have a 2 bolt anchor, I don't remember.  If not belay and rap off tree closeby.
content.location: Near the left end of the Hero Maker Wall, this climb starts behind a large boulder.  Start in the fistcrack on the slab in the prominent left-facing dihedral.

content.description: A steep start pulls you onto the slightly overhanging face. Climb through several series of challenging moves separated by good rests. Despite a little bit of dirty, scabby, damp rock and a few sharp holds, this line contains excellent and exciting movement. Make sure you stay left at the last few draws because the line to the right gets awfully close and contains a spicy finish.
content.location: Right of Dawn of the Dead. Left of Scattered Showers (12a).

content.description: Good Face Climbing, At about 55ft You got an all points off Dyno from Crimps to a jug.
content.location: Next Route left of Dawn of the Harl

content.description: Recently developed sport wall located at Sam's Throne. Hosts beautiful gently overhanging crimp fests that are reminiscent of the RRG
